titles: Fumifugium, or, The inconveniencie of the aer and smoak of London dissipated together with some remedies humbly proposed / by J.E. esq. to His Sacred Majestie, and to the Parliament now assembled.
author: Evelyn, John, 1620-1706.
publisher: Printed by W. Godbid for Gabriel Bedel and Thomas Collins ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
